About Charles Guo


Charles has more than 7 years of professional experience spanning technology, business and finance within large and small organizations both in Singapore and the United States. In addition to having graduated magna cum laude from Cornell University, Charles also holds Master's degrees from Stanford University and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.


Memory Game

Tech Memory is based on the classic 2-player memory game with the exception that the pictures are everyoneâ€™s favourite tech icons. Built using Javascript, Jquery and CSS.

Giarclist (Online Marketplace)

Giarclist is an online community marketplace for products and services. Built using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL and Bootstrap. Runs on S3 and Heroku.

Tradist

Group project was done together with my team-mates: [Firus](https://github.com/firusfaizal), [Hakim](https://github.com/hakimishere), [KT]() and [Leok Si](https://github.com/leokleok). [Tradist](https://github.com/K2GFA/Tradist) is a financial visualization and tracking service which allows users to access historical financial data for a select set of key commodities, indices and equities. Users can sign up for accounts and via JWT authentication, gain access to our data set through an API. We also provide a visual interface on our app's front end, with a variety of charts available to investigate correlations. Built using Node.js, Express, Plotly, MongoDB.

Pollnow

[Pollnow](https://pollnow.herokuapp.com/#/polls) is a reall-time polling application for users to quickly create polls and monitor the results of their polls live. Built using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Socket.IO, Bootstrap and Angular v1.
